title.description: The task title or name. Brief description of what action needs to be performed.

group.description: Task group name used to organize tasks within a case. Tasks with the same group are displayed together. Default group is 'default'.

description.description: Detailed description of the task, including instructions, context, or requirements for completion.

status.description: Current status of the task. If not specified, defaults to 'Waiting'. Valid values: 'Waiting', 'InProgress', 'Completed', 'Cancel'.

flag.description: Whether this task is flagged for attention. Flagged tasks are highlighted in the task list for visibility across the organisation. Defaults to false.

startDate.description: Timestamp (in milliseconds) when work on this task began. Can be set manually or automatically when status changes to 'InProgress'.

endDate.description: Timestamp (in milliseconds) when the task was completed or cancelled. Set when status changes to 'Completed' or 'Cancel'.

order.description: Sort order of the task within its group. Lower numbers appear first. Used to control display order in task lists.

dueDate.description: Timestamp (in milliseconds) when the task is due to be completed. Used for deadline tracking and task prioritization.

assignee.description: Email or username of the user assigned to work on this task. Tasks can be assigned to users within the organisation.

mandatory.description: Whether this task must be completed before the case can be closed. Mandatory tasks require at least one task log to be marked as 'Completed'. Defaults to false.
